mapper.select: SELECT l.COMPANY, g.AVG_GRADE, g.people_cnt FROM LODGMENT l LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROUND(AVG(GRADE),-1) AS AVG_GRADE ,COUNT(*) AS people_cnt, LODGMENT_NO FROM POSTSCRIPT GROUP BY LODGMENT_NO) g ON l.LODGMENT_NO = G.LODGMENT_NO AND l.LOCATION = #{location} AND l.LODGMENT_TYPE = #{lodgmentType}
